name: Space Hunt (itch)
description:
Space Hunt is a game about shooting the enemies in space. Your life is currency - You can use it (energy) to buy and shoot weapons.

How to play:
  • Shoot the enemies.
  • Avoid projectiles.
  • Avoid asteroids.
  • Basic Guns do not need energy.
  • Use energy (health) to shoot laser guns and to buy rockets or EMP.
  • Energy level must be at least at 25% (+ Cost) to buy weapon or to use laser guns.
  • Damaging enemies increases your energy level.
  • Use EMP to temporarily disable enemies.
  •  Enemies can use EMP to disable your ship aswell.
  • Do not let the energy to drop to 0.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:
  • Arrows / WASD - Movement
  • 1 / V - Shoot Guns
  • 2 / B - Shoot Lasers
  • 3 / N - Shoot Rockets
  • 4 / M - Shoot EMP
  • Q / K - Buy Rocket
  • E / L - Buy EMP
  • Escape / P - Pause Menu
Have fun!
